Meta confirms it is testing a standalone app for Vibes, its short-form video feed of AI videos, after “strong early traction”, without sharing specific numbers  —  Meta is testing a standalone Vibes app, the company confirmed to TechCrunch on Thursday.

items.title: LEGO unveils upcoming Icons Project Hail Mary set ahead of movie premiere + opens pre-orders
items.summary:
The new LEGO set unveilings just keep coming this month, and right behind the recent Ideas Yu-Gi-Oh! challenge submissions opening, we’re now getting the official reveal of the next LEGO sci-fi themed sets, the Icons 11389 Project Hail Mary. Not only is this new set, which is based on a very popular novel already open for pre-orders, but it will also be shipping out ahead of the long-awaited movie adaptation that comes a few weeks later. Head below to learn more about what you can expect, as well as browse through the collected photos and watch the trailer for the upcoming movie.

items.title: Several thousand people evacuated in southern Spain amid storm Leonardo
items.summary: MADRID, Feb. 5 (Xinhua) -- Torrential rains brought by storm Leonardo have forced the evacuation of around 3,000 to 5,000 people across southern Spain, including the entire population of the small hillside town of Grazalema in Cadiz province, local authorities said on Thursday. items.title: Logitech’s MX Keys S is one of our favorite wireless keyboards and it’s down to $95 today
items.summary:
As part of its wider sale on Logitech peripherals, Woot is offering the brand’s MX Keys S wireless keyboard in Graphite finish for $94.99 Prime shipped (a $6 delivery fee will apply otherwise). Don’t forget to enter promo code LOGITECHFIVE during checkout to see the discounted price. This is one of the more popular keyboards in Logitech’s MX lineup, and it rarely gets any discounts to drop from its $130 usual price. It’s currently fetching its full price at Amazon, where it has never dropped below the $96 mark. Today’s deal at Woot – when paired with the promo code – shaves an additional $1 off to mark one of the best prices we have tracked for it. This is the lowest price we have seen this keyboard fetch to date outside a brief drop at Walmart that had it down at $80, and you can learn more about it below.

items.title: Charge your phone anywhere you roam with this solar-powered EcoFlow Power Hat at $79
items.summary:
EcoFlow Solar Charging Power Hat

Buy for $79 (Reg. $129)

What we love

Folks who love the great outdoors will find solid power support to keep their phone and other essential personal devices with this EcoFlow Power Hat. It comes lined with solar paneling (as well as IP65 waterproof and dustproof ratings) and provides up to 12W charging speeds through its USB-C and USB-A ports, with the brand claiming it can recharge a phone in about three to four hours. You can wear it while hiking and during other activities, or even lay it down while doing other things, like on a chair to charge at locations like the beach, and more.

The white variant discounted today at Best Buy is compatible with PC and PS5, and it’s been mostly sold out across other retailers. The black model is currently going for $60 at Amazon, but today’s Best Buy deal undercuts that by an extra $20, setting a new best price to beat. It’s an already affordable model that’s now going for even less at 50% off, so be sure to snag one before stock runs out.

This bundle (without the trolley) starts from a $7,997 full price tag, both here and directly from the brand, while at Amazon it’s priced a little lower at $7,499. The discounts we’ve seen over the last year have mostly kept the costs down between $5,599 and $4,999, though it did go as low as $4,699 – but again, this is without the trolley, which only occasionally gets included for free during some direct sales. While these exclusive savings last, you’ll be getting a larger-than-ever $3,090 cut from the going rate (not counting the FREE trolley that is valued at $299), giving you a total $3,389 savings and a new all-time low price to bolster your home support with.
